name: Memories(College Project)
description:
The protagonist appears to be stuck in their dream. There is a bookcase of memories yet a couple are missing. There are many puzzles to solve in order to collect the remaining books/memories to complete the shelf and escape the sleep. 

The cube room can be navigated with arrows, up,side and down; this will let the player get the full 360 view. The player is also able to click and interact with objects as well as zoom in on certain elements, for example: taking a closer look at the clock. 

The puzzle that are currently planned are: opening a safe, growing a plant, chaining clock time, completing a painting. (This game is very early in development)
